# IDE Refresh Trigger

This file exists to trigger IDE TypeScript server refresh.
Last updated: 2026-02-07T22:23:50+05:30

## Status
All packages are installed correctly:
- firebase: 10.14.1 ✅
- lucide-react: 0.400.0 ✅  
- tailwindcss: 3.4.0 ✅
- All @types packages ✅

If you see "Cannot find module" errors, they are IDE caching issues.

## Quick Fix
1. Reload VS Code window: Ctrl+Shift+P → "Developer: Reload Window"
2. Or restart TypeScript server: Ctrl+Shift+P → "TypeScript: Restart TS Server"
